TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NameReferenceConverter extends System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter

summary.span: 提供类型转换，以将字符串名称转换成对具有该名称的对象的对象引用，或返回对象图中对象的名称。

span.span: Provides type conversion to convert a string name into an object reference to the object with that name, or to return the name of an object from the object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供的类型转换器包装大约两个服务。This class provides a type converter wrapper around two services. 实现使用服务中，从上下文能够在 XAML 中根据名称后执行对象的决策。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of an object by name in XAML. 这是相关的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器实现在.NET Framework XAML 服务的一部分。This is part of the relevant XAML reader and XAML writer implementations in .NET Framework XAML Services. 此转换器的正确函数需要会从服务上下文提供服务。Proper function of this converter requires that the service is available from service context. 实现使用服务中，从上下文，以在保存/序列化过程中执行名称解析的引用对象。The implementation uses service from context to perform the resolution of a reference name for an object during save/serialization. 这是相关的读取器和编写器实现和其上下文的一部分。This is part of the relevant reader and writer implementations and their context. 此转换器的正确函数需要有基础服务可用。Proper function of this converter requires that there be an underlying service available. 此类型转换器实现属于异常基类型，因为它不作用于离散的转换类型。This type converter implementation is atypical for the base type because it is not scoped to a discrete conversion type. 它可以可能任何对象与其他转换引用名称，但前提是该对象可以在 XAML 中，分配给它的名称和支持的上下文具有必要的服务，以返回结果。It can potentially convert any object to and from a referencing name so long as that object could have a name assigned to it in XAML, and the supporting context has the necessary services to return results. 作为一般服务支持的一部分，System.Xaml 基实现和提供和服务以供。As part of general services support, the System.Xaml base implementation of and provide and services for use by . 这些服务的名称基础使用`x:Name`或特性化别名属性。The name basis for these services uses either `x:Name` or a attributed alias property.

span.span: if the converter can perform the conversion; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`destinationType`引用键入返回`true`; 所有其他`destinationType`值返回`false`。A `destinationType` that references the type returns `true`; all other `destinationType` values return `false`. 如果此方法返回 false`context`是`null`，或者如果无法获取作为服务从`context`。This method returns false if `context` is `null`, or if cannot be obtained as a service from `context`.

param.span: 一个 ，用于提供格式上下文。

The to use as the current culture.

param.span: 要转换的引用名称字符串。

span.span: The reference name string to convert.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文和区域性信息将提供的对象转换为另一个对象。

span.span: Converts the provided object to another object, using the specified context and culture information.

returns.span: 返回的对象，该对象可能是在相关支持程序集中进行了类型映射的任何对象，并且可在 XAML 中通过 XAML 名称引用进行声明。

span.span: The returned object, which is potentially any object that is type-mapped in the relevant backing assemblies and capable of being declared in XAML with a XAML name reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅输入提供转换结果。Only a input provides a conversion result.
